籤詩版本二:
UQin Jun unyamezela ubomi obungagungqiyo kwaye uzimisele ukungenzi ububi.
De umntu asebenzise amandla ngobunono, amasebe afileyo kunye nemithi emidala iya kuphinda ikhule ibe ziintyatyambo.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana neentyatyambo zomthi ezifileyo.
Yonke into inempumelelo yayo.
解曰: Yiba ngongaguqukiyo kwaye uzolile. Izinto ziba yinyaniso. Ukuba iyashukuma, kuya kubakho iintlekele ezininzi. Akukho tyala ngokuthula.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ukuloba kwiWeishui
KuBukhosi bukaZhou, uJiang Shang, ogama linguZiya, wazalelwa eJi (inzalelwane yaseXuzhou, eMpuma China Sea), yaye igama lakhe lobuTao yayinguFei Xiong. Ukhokho wanikwa igama elithi Zai Lu (igama lendawo), ngoko ke wayebizwa ngokuba nguLu Wang.
Ukuze abalekele amaxesha anzima kaKumkani uZhou waseShang Dynasty, uJiang Ziya wayehlala ngasemanzini oLwandle lwaseTshayina lwaseMpuma kwaye wayeloba kuMlambo i-Weishui.
Ihuku lokuloba lithe tye, enyanisweni, intliziyo yakhe ayilobi, kodwa umnqweno wakhe kukuba yinkulumbuso.
UKumkani uWen weva ukuba ulumkile waza wamqesha njengomfundisi wakhe (inkulumbuso). (UJiang Ziya wayeneminyaka engamashumi asibhozo ubudala ngelo xesha)
Kamva, uKumkani uWu waseZhou wahlasela uKumkani uZhou waseShang, watshabalalisa iShang Dynasty, waza waseka iZhou Dynasty. UKumkani uWu wabiza uJiang Ziya Shangfu. Unyana kaFeng Jiang, uDing Gong, waba nguMarquis weQi.
(Eli bali sisikweko: linda ithuba, linda de kubekho ithuba lokuqalisa, emva koko uphuhliso luya kuqalisa.)
聖意: Ithamsanqa kwintsapho, ikhaya kunye nobutyebi, xa ixesha lifikile, ukuthengiselana kuya kuba yimpumelelo. Ukuba intombazana izalelwe eLiujia, abahamba ngeenyawo baya kuvala amasimi, i-silkworm ivaliwe. Imfuyo emithandathu kuya kuba nzima ukuyifumana. ithamsanqa ematyaleni, ekufudukeni, ekulondolozeni, ekulahlekeni kwempahla, ekuguleni, nakwiintsikelelo.
